p: Table 2 presents the main chemical compounds variation of essential oils in T. pulegioides habitats. Total amount of 131 habitants were investigated showing that the mean amount of α-TA in T. pulegioides habitats was lower than 1.5%. Interestingly, the obtained amount of α-TA was very different and, in some cases, reached the maximum value of 57.5% ( Table 2).
